title: Engr Risk Analysis
description:
Fundamental concepts of probability theory, risk analysis, and decision theory with applications to engineering systems; Bayesian
methods; uncertainty analysis; risk-informed decision making
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: CEE 3770 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or MATH 3670 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or MATH 3770 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or ISYE 3770 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C
